REWARDS.title: Keep sign in POSAPP!
REWARDS.description: Join our Rewards Program and get 100 points on your initial purchase by signing in on POSAPP! We ensure that you won't be spammed with unwanted advertisements, emails, or text messages from us, and we will keep your information confidential. Your information will be utilized for identification purposes only and will be used to notify you when needed. 100 points are only available for new Rewards Program members and will be not applicable to other promotions

REWARDS.title: Benefits of Rewards Program members:
description: Get 100 points when you sign up.
Get 10% Birthday Discount during your birthday week.

Refer 5 friends to get a free spa pedicure, and your friends will also get a 5% discount on their first time visit with a referral card with your name on it. For every $1 you spend at our salon in services you earn 1 loyalty point, and you receive a $10 off for every 500 points you receive. You can also save up to 1500 points to get a free deluxe pedicure worth $45.
Get email and text message on your appointment.
Get an email and a text message on active promotions.
Get all your spa receipts by email.

REWARDS.title: Terms and Conditions:
description: Your discounts can be applied to your services only. They are not transferable.
Discounts cannot be combined with any other promotions.
You have to sign up with POSAPP to get points!

submenu.title: Luxury Pedicure
submenu.description: Scent options: Japanese Cherry Blossom, Hawaii Citrus, Peony Orchid...
submenu.popContent: Get all of the benefits of hot stone massage, healing herbal neck wrap and collagen sock treatment.

submenu.title: Deluxe Pedicure
submenu.description: The Deluxe Pedicure includes the shaping of your nails and cuticle and callus removal. A refreshing and exfoliating OPI sugar...
submenu.popContent: The Deluxe Pedicure includes the shaping of your nails and cuticle and callus removal. A refreshing and exfoliating OPI sugar scrub removes all the dead skin. An OPI mud mask, hot towel wrap with paraffin wax, hot stone, and OPI lotion foot massage ensure that your feet are relaxed and replenished. We top off the experience with the application of polish of your choice!

submenu.title: Spa Pedicure
submenu.description: This service includes shaping of your nails, cuticle & callus removal. It also includes a refreshing and exfoliating...
submenu.popContent: This service includes shaping of your nails, cuticle & callus removal. It also includes a refreshing and exfoliating honey sugar scrub. Along with a foot massage, hot towels and polish, this is all you need for a relaxing time.

submenu.title: Classic Pedicure
submenu.description: Relax while we take care of the shaping of your nails, cuticle & callus removal, after which we will give you a...
submenu.popContent: Relax while we take care of the shaping of your nails, cuticle & callus removal, after which we will give you a lotion massage, hot towels and finally put polish, all at an affordable price of $25.

submenu.title: Dip Color
submenu.description: Dipping Powder is a nail dipping system that...
submenu.popContent: Dipping Powder is a nail dipping system that uses a brush-on gel base on the natural nail followed by dipping the nail in a powder. The powder comes in a variety of color pigments for a solid color style as well as light pink and bright white for a French manicure style. Like acrylics, dip powder is more durable compared to gel polish. It can withstand color chipping caused by water damage and doesn’t require a UV/LED light to cure. The composition of the dipping powder consists of a variety of vitamins, that helps in making the nails stronger.

submenu.title: Dip with Tip
submenu.description: Get stronger, lightweight, and naturally long-lasting nails with...
submenu.popContent: Get stronger, lightweight, and naturally long-lasting nails with our easy-to-use dip in powder nails and dip essentials that won’t damage the nail bed. Without harsh chemicals and with added vitamins and calcium to strengthen natural nails, it contains complex bonds that keep it from chipping, discoloring, and lifting. It matches with gel and nail lacquer.

submenu.title: Ombré Set
submenu.description: From the DCH blending system, ombré nails are...
submenu.popContent: From DCH blending system, ombré nails are a type of acrylic in which a color gradient is created. A light color on the top of the nail gradually blends into a darker color toward the tip.

SALON_MENU_IMAGES.title: MANICURE
SALON_MENU_IMAGES.subTitle: Come to our spa to relax, revive, and refresh, with our signature pedicure and manicure. We provide a variety of services to meet your needs!

Experience the refreshing and exfoliating mud mask, hot towels, paraffin wax, collagen gloves with lotion massage, and the application of polish.

submenu.title: Deluxe Manicure
submenu.description: In this service, we begin by shaping your nails and grooming and hydrating the cuticles. After a refreshing and exfoliating...
submenu.popContent: In this service, we begin by shaping your nails and grooming and hydrating the cuticles. After a refreshing and exfoliating OPI sugar scrub, the OPI hand mask is put to moisturize your hands. This service also includes a hot towel wrap with paraffin wax, OPI lotion hand massage. The nails are then painted with polish of choice.

submenu.title: Spa Manicure
submenu.description: Relax and unwind all your stress with this spa manicure. The service includes shaping of your nails and cuticle...
submenu.popContent: Relax and unwind all your stress with this spa manicure. The service includes shaping of your nails and cuticle care. A refreshing and exfoliating honey sugar scrub ensures removal of dead skin. Enjoy the gentle hand massage, as we top off with hot towels & polish.

submenu.title: Classic Manicure
submenu.description: The classic manicure service will give you a calming experience...
submenu.popContent: The classic manicure service will give you a calming experience. Relax while we shape of your nails, groom your cuticles, give you a lotion massage and finish off with polish.

FAQS.question: How is Gel Polish or Shellac Polish Removed?
FAQS.answer: Gel polish is very difficult to remove with standard nail polish remover and if you peel it off it can damage your nails so it is always advisable to book in for professional take off at …Nails This involves gentle hand filing, an acetone soak for a few minutes. Your Trieu Nails Technician will then use tools to remove the last of the polish and neaten up your nails ready to go!

FAQS.question: How Long Does Normal Polish Take to Dry?
FAQS.answer: When you have a classical manicure at Trieu Nails London, your technician will leave your polish to dry for about 5 minutes before applying a quick-dry spray, which accelerates the drying process. They will then check to see if your manicure still needs drying – it is you’ll have to sit back just a little longer to avoid smudges! In total, around 10-15 minutes after the last topcoat, your manicure should be touch dry and good to go. Just try to avoid knocking it (easily done by rummaging in your bag!) for about an hour until the polish has fully cured through all the coats.

FAQS.question: What is The Overlay?
FAQS.answer: This is when either acrylic or gel is applied over the natural nail without the need of a nail extension. Ideal for those who want just some slight length and thicker nails.

FAQS.question: How Do I Care for My Nails After My Manicure?
FAQS.answer: We advises a number of ways on how to care for your manicured nails. To keep a manicure lasting to its full potential avoid getting your nails wet for too long (constant soaking in hot baths or not wearing rubber gloves when washing the dishes) and also avoid coming into contact for prolonged periods with chemicals like those in sunscreen, perfumed products and insect repellent. Get someone else to do the DIY or tough chores that might cause your manicure to lift, and apply cuticle oil morning and night if you can. This will keep your nails super healthy throughout the duration of your manicure and it will help keep the polish intact. Finally, don’t pick at your manicure under any circumstances. Instead Book in for a Nail repair if one or nails have damaged otherwise treat yourself to another treatment.

FAQS.question: How Long Does Standard Polish Last for?
FAQS.answer: Standard nail polish usually lasts up to 5 days and is a great choice for temporary or short one off occasions. If that’s what you’re looking for then we recommend booking a classical manicure. It does take a fair few minutes to dry fully to avoid smudges on your manicure. If that’s too short of period for you then we recommend booking a shellac (gel) manicure at Nails Kute & Spa which is designed to last up to two weeks!

FAQS.question: What’s the Difference Between Acrylic, Gel Powder and UV Gel Nails?
FAQS.answer: For Acrylic nails the strong resin made of a powder and a liquid mixed together. It’s very hard wearing and we recommend it to people that bite their nails or use their hands a lot. For Gel Powder Nails the resin is a lot like acrylic and the composition is very similar. However, the finish is more clear compared to acrylic nails and its slight better quality. We’d recommend this to anyone going for a pale/nude colour on their manicured nails. UV Gel nails on the other hand is a hard gel that will allow you to make your nails longer without damaging your nail bed too much. It’s more flexible than acrylic and gel powder and not as hard wearing but it feels lighter on your hands. This needs to be cured by UV light, hence the name.

FAQS.question: How to book an appointment online?
FAQS.answer: Book your appointment by clicking on the Booking button. Please mention your name, phone number, and the service(s) required. We will respond to you and confirm your appointment.

data.name: Charlotte Patin
data.content: Amazing staff! So thorough and kind. Most relaxing experience of any place around

data.name: Latanya P.
data.content: My daughter’s and I go here. It is very clean, family friendly. They are up to date with the latest trends in nail colors and art.

data.name: Connie
data.content: Am in ❤️ with my new St Paddy’s Day nails. Was accommodated very last minute. Very detail oriented yet fast. Jenny is the best. 🍀

data.name: Heather Weldon
data.content: I absolutely love and recommend Nails Kute and Spa. Very clean, professional, and they always go above and beyond to make you feel welcome and appreciated. Excellent quality and the prices are great.

data.name: Mariana I.
data.content: These are the nails that I requested and they did a superior job! My lady was very nice and took her time doing my nails. I also got a pedicure and it was not rushed at all. Very relaxing. This is my go to salon now!

data.name: Keisha Y.
data.content: Today was a real win for me! I wanted to try this new place because the last place I went to was a disappointment. I got a Luxury pedicure which was very good and relaxing. I also got my dip redone. It was only my second time getting the dip, but the first time was so thick and ugly I was hesitant. I ended up LOVING my nails… they are natural by the way but on a total stroke of luck, I found Ben who I thought did the most amazing pedi ever when I got to Jacksonville four years ago in a completely different location. Turns out he is a perfectionist in everything. BEN IS AMAZING and I won’t lose him again! I’m one happy client.

data.name: Amanda W King
data.content: I asked for my daughter and I both to have a spa pedicure and mine lasted for over an hour and hers lasted for less than 15 minutes but they still charged us the same price when I said something to the owner he didn’t seem to care. Been going for a while but won’t be back.

data.name: Lauren Wagner
data.content: The best nail salon ever! I drive from Avondale/Riverside to get my nails done here. Nails Kute & Spa is so quiet and relaxing it’s the perfect place to unwind. I have Ben do my nails, but I have had my nails done by Jenny too. Both Ben and Jenny are meticulous with their work and your nails look perfect by the time you’re done. I’m always so impressed and happy with the quality of work the salon provides!

POLICIES: K Nail is equipped with the highest quality of products and services for your salon experience. Our licensed, well trained staff is dedicated to providing custom treatment based on your wants and needs within your scheduled service time, if you are dissatisfied with any of our work, we will be happy to redo the service, the same day.
Our nail care tools and pedicure spa tubs are thoroughly sanitized and/or disposed after each use.

For your complete relaxation and also out of consideration for other clients, we request you to please mute cell phones. Please also keep all phone calls to a minimum. This is to ensure a pleasant service to all.

We encourage you to arrive at least 10 minutes prior to your appointment. This will allow you plenty of time to park your car and check in. If you are a first time client, you may be asked to fill out a profile card.
We accept Cash, and all major credit cards included Visa and Mastercard. Minimum transaction for credit card is $10.
Gift cards are available for sale. It cannot be exchanged or returned.
Customers will be solely responsible for any personal items that they bring.
We reserve the right to not offer our services to people who may be considered rude or come with a bad attitude.

We do not give refunds or allow exchanges for any services performed or gift voucher. If you are unsatisfied with our service, please speak with the manager immediately and we will do our best to remedy the situation.
Our complimentary beverages are soda, water or wine. Alcohol will only be served for age of 21 or older.
